verses.roman:
yata yata bhakta-gaṇa vaise vṛndāvane
namra hañā śire dharoṅ sabāra caraṇe

synonyms: yata yata—each and every one; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; vaise—reside; vṛndāvane—at Vṛndāvana; namra hañā—becoming humble; śire—on my head; dharoṅ—I place; sabāra—of all; caraṇe—the lotus feet.
translation: I offer my respectful obeisances to all the residents of Vṛndāvana. I wish to place their lotus feet on my head in great humbleness.
